events.name: Indiana Pacers at New York Knicks

highlights.headline: KAT flexes after and-1 as Knicks inch closer to Game 5 win
highlights.description: Karl-Anthony Town knocks down a game-sealing and-1 for the Knicks late in the fourth quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KAT flexes after and-1 as Knicks inch closer to Game 5 win) 2025/05/30 ESHEET

highlights.headline: Brunson's 32-point night keeps Knicks alive in ECF
highlights.description: Jalen Brunson stands tall for New York as they overcome the Indiana Pacers in Game 5 to keep the series alive.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_Highlight (Brunson’s 32-point night keeps Knicks alive in ECF) 2025/05/30 ESHEET

highlights.headline: Indiana Pacers vs. New York Knicks: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Indiana Pacers vs. New York Knicks: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Indiana Pacers vs. New York Knicks: Game Highlights) 2025/05/30 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Jalen Brunson scored 32 points, Karl-Anthony Towns added 24 points and 13 rebounds despite a bruised left knee and the New York Knicks stayed alive in the Eastern Conference finals by beating the Indiana Pacers 111-94 on Thursday night in Game 5.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brunson, Towns carry Knicks to 111-94 victory that cuts Pacers' series lead to 3-2

video.headline: Indiana Pacers vs. New York Knicks: Game Highlights
